instructions: Connect your phone to your computer using the USB cable. When the 'Install PC programs' message appears, tap OK . When finished, the LG software radio button will be selected. Tap the Back key to get to the Tethering and Mobile HotSpot options.

Connect your phone to your computer using the USB cable. From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Tap Tethering & Networks . Tap the USB tethering switch to turn on. Follow the on-screen prompts.
